# Observable()

**Macro**

Defines and implements conformance of the Observable protocol.

## Declaration

```swift
@attached(member, names: named(_$observationRegistrar), named(access), named(withMutation), named(shouldNotifyObservers)) @attached(memberAttribute) @attached(extension, conformances: Observable) macro Observable()
```

## Overview

This macro adds observation support to a custom type and conforms the type to the [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Observation/Observable] protocol. For example, the following code applies the `Observable` macro to the type `Car` making it observable:

```swift
@Observable 
class Car {
   var name: String = ""
   var needsRepairs: Bool = false

   init(name: String, needsRepairs: Bool = false) {
       self.name = name
       self.needsRepairs = needsRepairs
   }
}
```

## Observable conformance

- **Observable**: A type that emits notifications to observers when underlying data changes.
